mutation sitesUpdateCloudInterconnectPhysicalConnection ( $accountId:ID! $updateCloudInterconnectPhysicalConnectionInput:UpdateCloudInterconnectPhysicalConnectionInput!) {
	sites ( accountId:$accountId ) {
		updateCloudInterconnectPhysicalConnection ( input:$updateCloudInterconnectPhysicalConnectionInput  )  {
			id
		}
	}	
}
